### Your membership makes it all possible.

|   
|   
| Through your support, the Sasse Museum offers everyone an opportunity to immerse themselves in creativity, expand their horizons, and discover a sense of belonging. You're joining a community that celebrates the transformative power of art and shares your passion for beauty and self-expression. We're deeply grateful for your connection to the Sasse. Most importantly, you're ensuring that everyone in our community can experience art and creativity free of charge. Now more than ever, we need member support to continue bringing the incredible exhibitions, programs, and experiences you love. |   
|   
|   
|   
|   
| 

> * * *
